title: TOURNAMENT CODE & HELP
body:
I am looking to host a tournament in my shop, but how do I get a tournament code so that I can spectate with no delay.  

Thank You
www.thevaporvenue.com
{{summoner:4}}

replies.body:
We have a website setup to help people along with that process! You should be able to get everything going by checking out our [**Community Events**](https://events.na.leagueoflegends.com/) page. Log in with the account you'd like to run the event with, then on the left-hand side where it says Events I'm Running you can click Create an Event! 

Let me know if you have any questions along the way and I can do my best to help out ^_^!
